attributes.name: PaymentMethod
attributes.description:
Stored `PaymentMethod` information (`card` or `bank_account`) used by donors to make online `Donation`s.

`PaymentMethod` data is for informational purposes only and cannot be used to create charges through the API.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique identifier for a payment method.

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: The date and time at which a payment method was created. Example: `2000-01-01T12:00:00Z`

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: The date and time at which a payment method was last updated. Example: `2000-01-01T12:00:00Z`

attributes.name: method_type
attributes.description:
Determines whether or not the payment method is a card or bank account.

Possible values: `card` or `bank_account`

attributes.name: method_subtype
attributes.description: For cards, either `credit`, `debit`, `prepaid`, or `unknown`. For bank accounts, either `checking` or `savings`.

attributes.name: last4
attributes.description: The last 4 digits of the payment method's number. For cards, this is the last 4 digits of the card number. For bank accounts, this is the last 4 digits of the bank account number. Note: In cases where we don't have all 4 digits on file, a `*` will be used to pad the number. For example: `*321`

attributes.name: brand
attributes.description: For cards, this is the card brand (eg Visa, Mastercard, etc). For bank accounts, this is the bank name.

attributes.name: expiration
attributes.description: For cards only. String representation of the expiration date in the `MM/YYYY` form (without leading zeros). Will be `null` for bank accounts.

attributes.name: verified
attributes.description: For bank accounts only. Will be `null` for cards.

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)
